full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**

### Title
Pressure Treated Decking Lumber

### Reference and Solicitation Number
WS4066945553; WS4066945553-Doc4071641886

### Notice Number and Amendment Number
5P128-220346, Amendment 2

### Publication Date and Tender Closing Date
2023-07-05; 2023-07-21 14:00:00 (Atlantic Time)

### Subject and Description
The Parks Canada Agency (PC) invites Offers from qualified suppliers to supply and deliver pressure-treated decking lumber. The estimated quantity and sizes are detailed in the solicitation documents. Materials must meet Canadian standards and comply with relevant industry specifications.

### Key Information

* Tender Category: Framing lumber (UNSPSC 30103603)
* Region of Delivery: Nova Scotia
* Procurement Method: Competitive bid (Open bidding)
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Applies to Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Procurement Status: Expiré (expired)

### Contracting Entity and End User Information
Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
 Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
 End User: Parks Canada Agency (PC)
 Address: 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, Quebec J8X 0B3, Canada

### Contact Information
Trisha Doucette (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [trisha.doucette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:trisha.doucette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Notice URL and Attachments
